PHRASE.LANG: Get the party started with these four awesome cowboy moves: horse-riding, side-skipping and lasso waving, as well as a mexican wave! [#Legal]
Mettez l'ambiance avec ces passes de danse de cowboy irrésistibles: le cavalier, le lasso, les pas chassés et la ola! Fou-rire garanti... [#Legal]
Haben Sie Spaß mit diesen vier tolle Cowboy Tänzen: Reiten, Springen und Lasso winken, sowie die Mexikanische Welle! [#Legal]
Dai inizio alla festa con queste quattro impressionanti mosse da cowboy: equitazione, salto laterale, lancio del lazo e la ola messicana! [#Legal]
Diviértete con estos cuatro baile de los vaqueros : el saltador, el lazo, el salto lateral y la ola![#Legal]

Get the party started with these four awesome cowboy moves: horse-riding, side-skipping and lasso waving, as well as the wave!


※This item is a portable item.
 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories.[#Legal]
